description: Information on care plan contacts and readings.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the care plan record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CTCT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: INST_OF_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the reading was made.

columns.name: READING_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
What the reading type is for this care plan reading


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active Reading


Edited Reading

columns.name: READING_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient. This column stores the patient encounter that the care plan was documented on.

columns.name: READING_EDIT_CAREPLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact identifier for the care plan. If present, this points to the contact that was edited by this documentation.
